title: i got hacked please help
body: Ok so i was playing a game and i got logged off my acc and someone changed my password and no one else but me has the information to the acc. i  tried to send a email to myself so when i went to go check i have proof that someone hacked to my email and changed the info of the acc. please help riot.

replies.body: If you believe your account has been accessed by an unauthorized user or email has been changed, we'd like to help.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help you with your recovery.  We'll respond to your ticket asap, but in the meantime I recommend reviewing our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to prepare for any questions you may be asked.  Hang in there!
